publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5016 Johann Lamont: Evening Times Glasgow Commuity Champions—That the Parliament congratulates The Evening Times and Glasgow City Council on the highly successful Community Champions Awards and welcomes the opportunity that these provide to recognise and celebrate the tireless work done by volunteers across Glasgow to make communities better; in particular notes with pride the success of Donna Foote, winner of the Neighbour Award, and St Paul’s High School pupils, winners of the Young Community Award, from the Glasgow Pollok constituency, and appreciates all that they have done to make a difference to their communities. Supported by: Jackson Carlaw*, Karen Gillon*, Charlie Gordon*, Bill Kidd*, John Park*, Patricia Ferguson*, Sandra White*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Cathy Jamieson*, Jackie Baillie*, Cathy Peattie*, Elaine Smith*, Trish Godman*
S3M-5016 Evening Times Glasgow Commuity Champions (lodged on 13 October 2009) James Kelly*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-5016 Evening Times Glasgow Commuity Champions (lodged on 13 October 2009) Des McNulty*
S3M-5016 Evening Times Glasgow Commuity Champions (lodged on 13 October 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-5016 Evening Times Glasgow Commuity Champions (lodged on 13 October 2009) Hugh Henry*
